title: Good Dog by Maya Gottfried / Robert Rahway Zakanitch
description:
In this heart-stealing picture book, fine artist Robert Rahway Zakanitch gives us 16 masterful, soulful, impossibly expressive portraits of dogs, and Maya Gottfried wonderfully captures their voices and inner personalities in 16 enchanting poems. ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s a doggie delight! 

These dogs beg to be patted, tickled, scratched, and ruffled. Which one will be your best friend? Zakanitch created the paintings for this book as an extension of his Aggressive Goodness Series of large-scale dog portraits whose unabashed purpose was to evoke the notion of goodness and to remind people of their aptitude for compassion. He lives in New York.

Genre: Children | Picture Book / Poetry
